abstract: The former Mets closer now in Milwaukee says he understands why the Mets traded him and talked about possibly returning to the team some day.
snippet: The former Mets closer now in Milwaukee says he understands why the Mets traded him and talked about possibly returning to the team some day.
lead_paragraph: MILWAUKEE - After pitching a scoreless eighth inning for the Brewers in their 9-6 win over the St. Louis Cardinals on Sunday night, Francisco Rodriguez was asked to contemplate the past year of his career, which has had more twists and gyrations than his pitching motion.

headline.main: Rodriguez, Happy to Be on Contender, Says He Has No Hard Feelings
